short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and select prompts for ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Prompt Saver: Streamline Your AI Conversations

Enhance your ChatGPT experience with this handy extension. Save your favorite prompts and quickly access them whenever you need. Perfect for:

• Researchers reusing complex queries
• Writers maintaining consistent character voices
• Developers storing code-related prompts
• Anyone who frequently uses specific ChatGPT instructions

Features:
• Easy prompt saving and organization
• Quick selection of saved prompts
• Seamless integration with ChatGPT interface

Boost your productivity and maintain consistency in your AI interactions with ChatGPT Prompt Saver.
